Assassins commit murder, either for pay or due to their belief in a cause, such as a religion or a political movement. Some assassins work alone and choose their own victims. Others are members of assassins' guilds, organizations that accept contracts to kill in return for money, favors, or both. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Assassin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=892) **Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 211 **Perception** +16 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +15, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14 **Str** +3 **Dex** +5 **Con** +2 **Int** +2 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 **Swift Sneak** The assassin can move their full Speed when [Sneaking](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ (20 arrows), [lesser darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), [Giant Centipede Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=113) (3), [_invisibility potion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=187), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [_+1 rapier_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [simple injury poison](/Feats.aspx?ID=563) (8 doses, 2d4 poison damage), sleep poison (2) --- **AC** 26 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +19 **Will** +14 **HP** 130 **Deny Advantage** The assassin isn't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to creatures of 8th level or lower that are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), flanking, or using surprise attack.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** The assassin is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see; **Effect** The assassin gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** rapier +18 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d6+8 piercing **Ranged** composite shortbow +20 ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 2d6+4 piercing **Poison Weapon** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The assassin is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand; **Effect** The assassin applies a poison to the weapon. **Quick Draw** The assassin Interacts to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The assassin deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Surprise Attack** On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the assassin.
name: Assassin
